publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-4942.1 Stuart McMillan: Inverclyde Community Maternity Unit Must Remain 24/7—As an amendment to motion (S3M-4942) in the name of Ross Finnie, after "2008" insert ", after a strong and concerted campaign by local residents that led to the Cabinet Secretary for Health and Wellbeing instigating a review of maternity services". Motions and amendments which have attracted additional support
S3M-4942.1 Inverclyde Community Maternity Unit Must Remain 24/7 (lodged on 28 September 2009) Bill Wilson*, Rob Gibson*, Sandra White*, Kenneth Gibson*
S3M-4942.1 Inverclyde Community Maternity Unit Must Remain 24/7 (lodged on 28 September 2009) Bill Kidd*

S3M-4942.1 Stuart McMillan: Inverclyde Community Maternity Unit Must Remain 24/7—As an amendment to motion (S3M-4942) in the name of Ross Finnie, after "2008" insert ", after a strong and concerted campaign by local residents that led to the Cabinet Secretary for Health and Wellbeing instigating a review of maternity services". Supported by: Bill Wilson, Rob Gibson, Sandra White, Kenneth Gibson, Bill Kidd
